mapper.select: SELECT r.merchant_uid, max(paid_amount) paid_amount, max(r.mem_cd) mem_cd, max(mem_grade) mem_grade FROM ( SELECT * FROM screen WHERE to_char(startdate, 'yyyyMMdd') = to_char(sysdate - 1, 'yyyyMMdd') ) s, reservation r, pay_detail p, MEMBER m WHERE s.screen_cd = r.screen_cd AND r.merchant_uid = p.merchant_uid AND r.mem_cd = m.mem_cd AND r.gb_cancel = 'N' GROUP BY r.merchant_uid
